medical_history.chief_complaint: New-onset Nocardia lymphadenitis and multiple cavitary lung nodules.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a history of multiple infections starting 2 months after birth, with the most significant incident being ruptured appendicitis at 22 months. Presentation of Nocardia lymphadenitis occurred with multiple cavitary lung nodules.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had a history of multiple infections, including X-linked Chronic Granulomatous Disease (CGD) with McLeod syndrome (MLS) confirmed by chromosomal microarray showing a de novo mutation.
